curam.core.impl

Interface Mapper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StreamableMapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchServiceMapper, SearchServiceMapperForStreaming

    public interface Mapper
    Maps Curam Search Service entities to their counterparts in the staging database and staging DB rows to Curam database Entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • mapToStagingDb

        SearchServiceRowDtlsList mapToStagingDb(SearchServiceKey id)
                                 throws AppException,
                                        InformationalException
        Maps information in the Application database to the search service staging database for the specified search service id.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifier of the search service.
        Returns:
        the list of all mapped rows for the specified search service.
        Throws:
        AppException - application exception
        InformationalException - information exception.

      • getExtKey

        java.lang.String getExtKey(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
                           java.util.List<?> objList)
                    throws AppException,
                           InformationalException
        Gets the Row external value for the specified object list. Usually for each search there is a 'main' entity - the unique ID belonging to this is the best choice. The value returned must be unique for this search. If null or an empty string is returned then the Search Controller will not perform the insert or modify operation.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        objList - the list of person search related entity objects.
        Returns:
        the externalKey.
        Throws:
        AppException - application exception
        InformationalException - information exception.

      • getObjectList

        java.util.List<?> getObjectList(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
                                java.lang.Object objDtls)
                         throws AppException,
                                InformationalException
        Get the list of entities for this service for the specified dtls struct. Assume your search service is a Person search, and you search data across the entities Person, ConcernRole, and Address. Your mapper implementation takes a dtls struct for any of those entities, determines the type of the struct, and returns dtls structs for all the records in the search related to the particular struct that was passed in - i.e. for the example above if a PersonDtls object is passed in the mapper returns a List containing the PersonDtls object, the related ConcernRoleDtls object, and the AddressDtls object for that Person.

        It is possible that the specific database being updated is not relevant to the search that this mapper belongs to, even though the search includes information from that type of entity. The classic example is Address - your search may be interested in Person addresses, but not Employer addresses. If this situation arises this method should return null or an empty list. Do not simply return a list containing the original objDtls struct passed in to signify that there is no update to the search.

        A single update might also result in updating multiple searchable records. Again taking Address as an example, a number of ConcernRoles might reference the same Address as their primary address. If that address is updated then the mapper needs to return sets of objects for each search record that needs to be updated in the index. The way to do this is to return a List containing other Lists, which each contain the set of objects relating to a searchable record.

        If there is one set of objects to be returned then either a single List containing the objects can be returned, or a List containing a single List containing the objects.

        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        objDtls - the dtls struct used to retrieve the entity object list.
        Returns:
        the list of entity details
        Throws:
        AppException - application exception
        InformationalException - information exception.

      • getFieldValue

        java.lang.Object getFieldValue(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
                               java.util.List<?> objList,
                               SearchServiceFieldDtls field)
                        throws AppException,
                               InformationalException
        Gets the specified field value from the list of entity objects specified. The mapper must iterate through the list of objects passed in (which are dtls structs as described above for getObjectList), identify which one contains the field in question, and return the appropriate value from the dtls struct.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        objList - the list of entity object relating to a search service row.
        field - the field whose value is required.
        Returns:
        the value of the field.
        Throws:
        AppException - application exception.
        InformationalException - information exception.

      • remove

        void remove(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
            java.lang.Object objKey)
     throws AppException,
            InformationalException
        Removes an object from the staging database. Used during synchronization.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        objKey - the object to be removed.
        Throws:
        AppException - aplication exception.
        InformationalException - information exception.
